pages.title: Green Mamba
pages.text: The eastern green mamba ($(o)Dendroaspis angusticeps$()) is a highly venomous snake species of the mamba genus Dendroaspis native to the coastal regions of southern East Africa.

pages.title: Green Mamba
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
